subject: Re: Staging Website Access

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Thanks for getting back to me. Can we please have a blank Wordpress install?

Thanks,
Sandy

On Wed, Jul 31, 2019 at 6:51 PM Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
Hi Sandy,

Ok sure, there is a staging site available for Osier Belle under their plan. Do you want it to be a clone of the current live site or a blank WordPress install?

Thanks,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>

>
> Hi Heath,
>
> I hope you're well.
>
> I was wondering whether you had a staging website available for our team to start build on developing the new website for Osier Belle?
>
> If so, can you please provide us with access for via your host server? And any other credentials that we may need.
>
> Thanks,
> Sandy
